fields.name: Inventinator (Charge 100%):
fields.value: Write a non-passive ability and it will be given to your target with 1x ammo (no charge). The new ability may not modify abilities, ammo, or charge; nor grant any repeating effect. Your target will be informed of the ability name and full description. You may not self-target. The new ability name must end in "inator."

fields.name: Boomerang (Passive):
fields.value: If someone dies with ammo still on one of your Inventinator abilities, the ability and ammo will be transferred to you.

fields.name: Disguise (Passive):
fields.value: Triggered when you score above 60%. If you are visited by a Town Investigative or Town Killing player, that player will be astrally roleblocked.

fields.name: Perry The Platypus! (Passive):
fields.value: Every time you use Inventinator, a random, higher-scoring Town Investigative player (if any) will be notified "Doofenschmirtz invented the [ability name and description]!"
